congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Removing the sunset provision of section 203 of Public Law 105-384
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 374, to remove the sunset provision of section 203 of Public Law 105-384, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 388 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 66;

extension.searchTitle: OCMULGEE MOUNDS NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK BOUNDARY REVISION ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 15

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Ocmulgee Mounds National Historical Park Boundary Revision Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 538, amended, to redesignate Ocmulgee National Monument in the State of Georgia and revise its boundary, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 396 yeas to 8 nays, Roll No. 67;
